job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: Who we arebrbrThe average public high school student in the US receives 38 minutes of guidance across 4 years Here at CollegeVine were working to close the guidance gap by providing free personalized guidance to all students Weve helped thousands of students get into college since 2013 and in 2019 pivoted to an alldigital guidance offering to expand our impact Transitioning from oneonone guidance to a 100 software offering is a big responsibility but weve been able to meet it thanks to our unique culturebrbrYoull be joining a distributed talented team thats deeply invested in the problems were trying to solve We live all around the world working from our homes coffee shops and even a boat We recruit and hire from varied backgrounds based on our belief that our teams diversity allows us to create better solutions for familiesbrbrWho were looking forbrbrYou know youre right for this position ifbrulliYou seek ownership beyond your own work and look to the product and company as a wholeliliYou are a selfstarter and internally motivated with a strong desire to be part of a successful team that shares your high standardsliliYou understand what it means to be entrepreneurial and resourceful Perhaps youve launched your own sideproject worked at a startup or helped a scrappy business grow quicklybrbrliulstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongIn addition to your awesome attitude and values were looking for someone with the following skillsbrulliExpertise with statistical software ie R Python Julia Matlab and databases SQLliliYoure comfortable with gitliliExcellent communication skillslili5 years as a data scientistbrliulIts an added bonus if you havebrulliPrior experience leading a teamliliPrior experience working with Rails Django or another MVC web frameworkliliWorked remotely beforeliliGone through the US college admissions process or can articulate how it worksbrbrliulstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongYoull be assuming ownership for our core algorithms and models This means not only are you responsible for maintaining them but we also expect you to propose radical improvements and suggest new areas for us to apply data sciencebrbrYoull be responsible for maintaining your own roadmap with input from our product teams But the roadmap is ultimately yoursbrbrstrongYour first weekbrbrstrongYoull be given a crash course in how college admissions works Youll meet the team and start working on one of the projects in our backlog Finally youll start learning how our website worksbrbrstrongYour first monthbrbrstrongYoull continue working through the project backlog We also expect youll be soaking up admissions knowledge which means youll start suggesting some project ideas of your own Well also make sure youve begun building relationships with our PMsbrbrstrongThree months inbrbrstrongBy this point you should be starting to shape your own roadmap and executing against itbrbrstrongSix months inbrbrstrongA lot can happen in six months During your first six months youve leveled up our core algorithms and have started exploring new ways data science can help CollegeVines families and partnersbrbrstronguBenefitsbrbrustrongWe offer a competitive salary and a full suite of benefits some of them unconventional but awesome for the right personbrulliMedical dental vision insurance and a 401kliliFlexible workday with a 4hour core centered on EST  plan the rest of your workday as you wish just give us the majority of your most creative hoursliliGoalbased environment as opposed to grindbased or decreebased environment work smarter not harder intelligently not mindlessly We collaborate on setting goals but you set your own process for accomplishing those goals You will be entrusted with a lot of responsibility and you might even experience fulfillment and selfactualization as a resultliliJoin an engineering culture that celebrates mindfulness and takes the quality of your attention seriouslybrliulRemember Were a startup Youre an early employee We face challenges We have to ship a lot Your ideas matter You will make a differencebrbrWe are committed to a diverse and vibrant workforce If you lack a specific credential for this position but believe that your strengths and life experiences will propel our mission we would love to hear from youbrbrThis is a TelecommuteWork from Home positionbrbrPowered by JazzHRbrbrFWr9uDlMiD
